attributes.review: When the app starts up there’s a scary monster like figure with his fist in the air. Little kids around me got scared. You should at least have a warning in the future. Displeased.
attributes.title: Scary figure

attributes.review: I thought this was suspossed to be for trump they just put a orange on my screen I am very disappointed with this app I expected WAY better and also it says trump 2020 no anonymous 2020
attributes.title: I’m disappointed  🍊

this app took forever to download and is filled with fake news. i hope our amazing 🤢president gets that taken care of. ᗷᕼᑌᗴᔕᒍYᗴᔕ 🤷sometimes✨i🙁don't😢wanna😱be😼happy🧚don't✋hold😇it🤪against😈me🙆.

attributes.review: This app took forever to download and i ended up getting a virus! It was so bad i had to spend my hard earned money to get it fixed, but the damage was done. I had to get a new phone, DO NOT GET THIS APP!
attributes.title: One star!

attributes.review: This app is probably the worst app ever . Its so slow and glitches so bad, it also took forever to download I honestly do not understand why this app is still up
